com.matrixone.apps.domain.util
Class mxType

java.lang.Object
  com.matrixone.apps.domain.util.mxType

public class mxType
extends java.lang.Object

The mxType class provides tools for the Java developer to easily manipulate and retrieve information about Business Types. This class consists exclusively of static methods.

Version:
1.0 - Copyright (c) 2001, MatrixOne, Inc.
See Also:
matrix.db.BusinessType

Method Detail

getAttributes

public static MapList getAttributes(Context context,
                                    java.lang.String sType)
                             throws FrameworkException
Find all attribute type, name, description, choices and its default value for a given type.

Example:
 String sType = "Person";
 MapList typeAttrs = mxType.getAttributes(context, sType);

Parameters:
context - the eMatrix Context object
sType - The business type to get the attributes.
Returns:
MapList of all the attributes for the type. Map Key Items: SEL_ATTRIBUTE_TYPE, SEL_ATTRUBUTE_NAME, SEL_ATTRIBUTE_CHOICES, SEL_ATTRIBUTE_MULTILINE, SEL_ATTRIBUTE_DEFAULT; e.g. map.get(mxType.SEL_ATTRIBUTE_TYPE);
Throws:
FrameworkException - if operation fails

getAttributes

public static MapList getAttributes(Context context,
                                    java.lang.String sType,
                                    boolean includeMultiLine)
                             throws FrameworkException
Find all attribute type, name, description, choices and its default value for a given type.

Example:
 String sType = "Person";
 MapList typeAttrs = mxType.getAttributes(context, sType);

Parameters:
context - the eMatrix Context object
sType - The business type to get the attributes.
includeMultiLine - The boolean value of includeMultiLine
Returns:
MapList of all the attributes for the type. Map Key Items: SEL_ATTRIBUTE_TYPE, SEL_ATTRUBUTE_NAME, SEL_ATTRIBUTE_CHOICES, SEL_ATTRIBUTE_MULTILINE, SEL_ATTRIBUTE_DEFAULT; e.g. map.get(mxType.SEL_ATTRIBUTE_TYPE);
Throws:
FrameworkException - if operation fails

getDefaultPolicy

public static java.util.Map getDefaultPolicy(Context context,
                                             java.lang.String type,
                                             boolean forPerson)
                                      throws FrameworkException
Get the default policy for type. The return value is based on the first policy in the sequence.

Example:
 String sType = "Project";
 Map policyInfo = mxType.getDefaultPolicy(context, sType, true);

Parameters:
context - the eMatrix Context object
type - The business type to get the attributes.
forPerson - The policy should be based on create access. Otherwise, first type policy is returned.
Returns:
Map of the policy information. Key Items: name (name of policy), description (description of policy), revision (initial revision in sequence). null is returned when there are no policies for the type.
Throws:
FrameworkException - if operation fails

getPolicies

public static MapList getPolicies(Context context,
                                  java.lang.String type,
                                  boolean forPerson)
                           throws MatrixException
Get the policies for the specified type.

Example:
 String type = "Project";
 MapList policyList = mxType.getPolicies(context, type, true);

Parameters:
context - the eMatrix Context object
type - The business type to get policies for
forPerson - The list should be based on create access. Otherwise, all type policies are returned
Returns:
The list of policies in a format of a MapList. Map Keys: name (name of policy), description (description of policy), revision (initial revision in sequence). an empty list is returned when there are no policies.
Throws:
MatrixException - if operation fails

isOfParentType

public static boolean isOfParentType(Context context,
                                     java.lang.String childType,
                                     java.lang.String parentType)
                              throws FrameworkException
Verifies whether the Child Type is derived from the Parent Type.

Parameters:
context - the eMatrix Context object
childType - The child business type that needs to be checked
parentType - The parent business type under which the child needs to be checked for being derived
Returns:
booelan true if the child type is a derived type of the parent. booelan false if the child type is not
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if operation fails
FrameworkException
